entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NullReferenceException in JsonSerializer.Deserialize #60448
  • Generic math does not work in WASM AOT #60447
  • System.Net.Security.SslStream stream.TargetHostName is empty when SNI-name is not empty #60431
  • System.IO.Tests.File_ReadWriteAllBytes.ReadAllBytes_NonSeekableFileStream_InWindows failed #60427
  • Provide an option to use an apphost with exports for GPU drivers #60422
  • Disk files larger than 4GB may not be read properly #60430
  • FileSystemWatcher does not fire when file changes #60417
  • Cannot run runtime tests with lttng 2.13 #60407
  • [QUIC] Outerloop test failures with QuicConnectionAbortedException instead of QuicOperationAbortedException #60405
  • Rolling build failures in System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Tests #60403
  • [API Proposal]: Add lowercase support for Convert.ToHexString #60393
  • [wasm] gpath.c:115: assertion 'filename != NULL' failed #60392
    7.0.0
  • Revalidate pooled SocketsHttpHandler connections periodically #60390
  • [API Proposal]: Expose method on PeriodicTimer to adjust interval #60384
  • Test failure threading.NamedMutex.test1 #60383
  • Test failure readytorun\\determinism\\crossgen2determinism\\crossgen2determinism.cmd #60382
  • Test failure baseservices\\TieredCompilation\\BasicTestWithMcj\\BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #60381
  • [API Proposal]: Add GetDeclaringType to PropertyDefinition and EventDefinition #60380
    7.0.0

Closed

  • dotnet --info reports duplicates of paths #59833
    6.0.0
  • system.io.tests.file_readwriteallbytes.readallbytes_nonseekablefilestream_inwindows #60444
  • Publishing a Blazor Wasm project process seems to run twice if the "wasm-tools" workload is installed in .NET6 RC2. #60412
  • Deployment and Servicing guidance for customers #3351
    6.0.0
  • BrowserHttpHandler can't stream large responses even with SetBrowserResponseStreamingEnabled #60287
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.BindProperty(PropertyInfo,object, IConfiguration, BinderOptions) – harmful call to PropertyInfo.GetValue(object) #52905
    7.0.0
  • Improve superpmi scripts #59559
    7.0.0
  • FileInfo fails when invoked on a WebDav path that contains @ char #60419
  • DAC crashes WinDBGX on DBG/CHK builds #60321
    7.0.0
  • Code cleanup: Remove EffectiveKeyLength from BasicSymmetricCipher types #60322
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose JsonContentOfT publicly #60378
    7.0.0
  • How to properly benchmark FileStream.Write vs WriteFile? #60268
    Future
  • System.Text.Json constructor deserialization without attribute #54332
    7.0.0
  • Utf8JsonReader/Writer should expose useful (currently internal) methods. #54016
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: File.WriteAllBytes overload for Span<byte> and ReadOnlySpan<byte> #59770
    Future
  • Analyzer proposal: Declare elements attributed with `JsonPropertyName` as nullable #55130
    7.0.0
  • `build.cmd` fails with latest VS 2022 dogfood #60061
  • Support JsonEncodedText propertyName for JsonElement.{Try}GetProperty #53858
    7.0.0
  • Consider making TryGetEnumeratedCount an interface method with default implementation #52775
    7.0.0
  • Compatibility of System.Drawing.Common with Blazor wasm #38475
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: object.ToStringBuilder(StringBuilder builder) #60402
  • tail. call got stack overflow error !? #40581
    Future
  • [HTTP/3] Http3RequestStream is not properly aborted on finalization #60141
  • [HTTP3] Loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync logic is wrong #58234
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.ServiceProcess.Tests.ServiceBaseTests.TestOnStartWithArgsThenStop #49681
    Future
  • CI failure in the test System.IO.Tests.FileStream_DeleteOnClose.OpenOrCreate_DeleteOnClose_UsableAsMutex #60147
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Serialize] Unable to serialize List<(MyClass, string)> #60387
  • Custom GC document missing in project folder #60389
  • PerformanceCounter_NextValue_ProcessorCounter failed in CI #29753
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_Create_Obsolete_CCD #54943
    Future
  • CI failure in System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter.Tests #45182
    Future
  • PerformanceCounter Exception When Invoked for Current Process #48292
    Future
  • [Tizen] CI for pull requests #2394
    Future
  • Test failure:JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/Avx2/Avx2_ro/Avx2_ro.sh #57462
    7.0.0
  • [Mono] Tests failed on windows: System.Diagnostics.Tests.CounterSampleTests #34409
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter written perfcounters cannot be read on a machine without .NETFramework #46589
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter for the same counter fails with `InvalidOperationException: Cannot create file mapping.` when running multiple instance with different credentials #49782
    Future
  • [NET5] PerformanceCounter and invalid culture identifier exception #48771
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60446
    area-Host
  • Fix null being passed to g_path_get_dirname when probing in wasm #60445
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add a missing else to the delegate init code. #60433
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Experiment with Unsafe.StackAlloc<T> #60428
    area-Meta
  • Maui Android Size on Disk Integration #60425
  • Exclude ref .cs files from .editorconfig formatting #60424
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Add check for field->type->byref #60420
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [HTTP] Add logging of request and response #60418
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [tests] If -debug is LLDB, add separator before corerun and args #60416
    test enhancement, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/5.0] Add pull request template for 5.0 to point to the servicing docs #60414
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid cached int[] in Console on Unix #60411
    area-System.Console
  • Avoid unnecessary cached char[] in StringParsingHelpers #60409
    area-System.Net
  • Avoid int[] allocation in ResourceReader when reading a decimal #60408
    area-System.Resources
  • Avoid a small int[] allocation in StringBuilder.Replace #60406
  • Use SDK-selected runtime in IL SDK #60400
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [reflection] Initialize default ALC gchandle in GetLoadContext #60399
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.0
  • Feature/get debug view value processing #60391
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add limited support for backtracking Regex single char loops to simplified code gen #60385
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Apply custom Message and Url to all generic math [RequiresPreviewFeatures] attributes #60379
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Remove duplicate entries from dotnet --info #60376
    area-Host
  • Finish SuperPMI collect testing #60432
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.Drawing.Common.Tests fail ToLogFont_Invoke tests on non English Windows #59328
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][test] BrowserHttpHandler stream large responses with SetBrowserResponseStreamingEnabled #60339
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, test enhancement, 7.0.0
  • Add section for design alternatives #60426
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Meta
  • Use more reliable toolexe path #60421
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove extra call to PropertyInfo.GetValue(object) #60415
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Update SuperPMI CI automation #60375
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove RC2 EffectiveKeyLength #60373
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60319
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix CRC32 encoding #60360
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • File.*AllText* optimizations #58167
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Don't error out from GetOrCreateLayout in the DAC if no layout creation is needed #60401
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Sod pre command fix #60413
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [docs] Add LLDB debugging instructions for Mono running a runtime test #60410
    area-Meta
  • [hack] fix Release builds of CoreCLR #60404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix HTTP/3 loopback server WaitForCancellationAsync and aborting on finalization #60395
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [reflection] Initialize default ALC gchandle in GetLoadContext #60350
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • fix TestOnStartWithArgsThenStop #60386
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Disabled NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #60394
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Follow up on Scatter/Gather API changes #58447
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [metadata] Replace uses of MonoType:byref by a getter #60313
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Test fix: FileStream DeleteOnClose run on OuterLoop with longer timeout #60149
    area-System.IO
  • Fix PerformanceCounter tests #60372
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • [wasm] rationalize internal exports #60075
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Port: Fix StartTLS in DirectoryService.Protocols in 6.0 to main #60359
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • Add design details regarding dynamic buffers in struct marshalling #60374
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Make all delegates support fully general generics (In support of Action/Func of everything) #60377

Updated

  • Reflection Invoke share more coreclr/mono #60270
    area-System.Reflection
  • Optimize indirection cell call sequences more generally #59602
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Unify set-reg-to-imm functions and optimize with LEA at runtime on x64 #60228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docs for PipeReader.TryRead #52237
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Move 2 Drawing APIs that are not implemented in netfx to net6.0 or later #60371
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Drawing
  • prevent manifest sending for special cased event sources #60357
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Eliminate pre-built assets during source-build #60370
    area-Infrastructure
  • Implement IAsyncEnumerable<T>.ToBlockingEnumerable #60363
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement Narrow and Widen using SIMDAsHWIntrinsic #60094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Fixed stress #60364
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add Fuzzlyn to CI #60344
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60265
    area-Build-mono
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • issue 56835 make ordered dictionary kv collection implement i list #60060
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • FileStatus.Unix/Process.Unix: align caching of user identity. #60160
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.TXT #60092
    area-Setup
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing #60355
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14

Created

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet format does not work in WPF projects in .NET 6 RC 2 #22068
  • PublishReadyToRunComposite and PublishReadyToRunUseCrossgen2 fails #22067
  • .NET SDK Debian 11, Alpine 3.14 and Ubuntu 20.04 has vulnerabilities in ACR Qualys Scan #22056
  • dotnet process exits very slowly on MacOS #22054
  • Fix duplicate AnalysisLevel_*.editorconfig files packaged inside the .NET SDK #22051
  • [Known Issue] Installing VS2022 Preview 5.0 and/or .NET 6.0 RC2 results in x86 dotnet on the PATH #22047
  • Migration to .NET 6 RC-2 from .NET 5 #22053
  • [Breaking change] Stop adding `C:\Program Files(x86)\dotnet` to the path on x64 and Arm64 machines #22030
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • The SDK info duplicate display after install .NET Core 6.0 RTM/.NET Core 7.0 #22050
  • Update to .NET 6 RC 2, then workloads are not able to GC #21983

PullRequests

Created

  • [Razor] Fix up-to-date check on static web assets #22045
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22035
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix demand for internal build on Windows #21999
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use NuGetPackageVersion in dotnet.*.js file name #21919
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.1xx

Updated

  • Adding `DotNetWatchBuild` variable to the msbuild initiated by dotnet-watch #21722
    Area-Watch
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.4xx #20865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22001
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API proposal: Compilation.GetDeterministicKey #57162
    17.1
  • CS0103 fixer for missing LHS of assignment incorrectly suggests turning missing variable into a type name. #57157
  • Test plan for "newlines in interpolations" #57154
    17.1
  • Array Initializer into class property throws null reference exception #57153
  • csc failed while building (Span<T> element comparing) #57148
    17.1
  • Proposal: Record applied/cancelled status of code action dialogs in telemetry #57147
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57146
    17.1
  • Upgrading VS build gives CS1668 in existing console windows #57143
  • Disallow null-suppression operator `!` applies to value type contexts #57142
    17.1

Closed

  • Remove warning suppressions from EditorFeatures.Cocoa project #48871
    Backlog
  • Create a view like Call Hierarchy for Data Flow Analysis (aka Value Tracking) #25994
    Backlog
  • CS0165 generated from a case where definite assignment seems satisfied. #57141
    17.1
  • extern alias and source generators #54073
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Build more projects during source-build #57165
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding some additional tests and asserts #57164
    Area-IDE
  • Handle 'out'. Add some metadata decoding. #57163
    Area-Compilers
  • Draft #57161
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we don't throw when we filter an incomplete list to be empty #57160
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Resolve Microsoft.DotNet prebuilts for source-build #57159
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 17.0-vs-deps to 17.0 #57156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Record status for "newlines in interpolations" #57155
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Avoid NFE telemetry for normal cancellation scenarios #57151
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P1
  • Document break for negative Length tests #57149
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix QuickInfo on dot of member access #57145
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57144
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • Completion options4 #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add Visual Studio 2022 Editor Color Scheme #57138
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Add breaking changes doc for .NET 7 #57152
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Add new high memory events for releasing Roslyn caches #54850
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove #pragma suppressions from EditorFeatures.Cocoa #56974
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #57133
    Area-IDE, Next
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan optimization for stackalloc #57123
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support 'ref' type arguments in delegates #57135
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify the Lambda Functions #51731
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57115
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move stack allocations to start of the method to avoid repeated allocations in loops #57130
    Area-Compilers
  • Removed collapse for namespace level #57125
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57166
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Ensure new files are formatted based on the right language version #57119
    Area-IDE
  • Fix import reader #57117
    Area-IDE
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Obtain OutputRefFilePath from project system #55244
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the BranchId concept from teh workspace #57132
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Fix 'T is new()' crash #57091
    Area-Compilers
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Improve `CSharpSyntaxFacts.IsValidIdentifier` performance #55510
    Area-IDE, Community, Area-Performance
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Honor suppression on tuple element in switch #57118
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove constraint check in interesting scenario for dynamic constraint checking feature #57131
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Identity SignInManager don't check SupportsUserLockout #37575
  • WebAssembly in .Net 6 RC2: The top level app must directly references to the assemblies used by it's referenced assemblies #37574
  • Blazor WASM with LazyLoad - Cannot publish web project in RC2 #37570
  • Razor compiler does not generate C# for partial @using directives #37568
  • Debugging Blazor Webassembly running in a dev container #37565
  • Windows auth template doesn't include Kestrel auth components #37556
  • DefaultTokenProviders don't work when having more than 2 user accounts #37555
    Discussions
  • Update IdenitityModel dependencies (in 5.x) #37553
  • id_token signature validation in OpenIdConnectHandler in case of authorization code flow #37549
  • Perf improvement: json_nodejs #37545
  • dotnet publish -c Release fail with <RunAOTCompilation>true</RunAOTCompilation> and <BlazorWebAssemblyLazyLoad #37546
    6.0.0
  • Kestrel settings are not applied if configure KestrelServerOptions in appsettings.json file #37544
  • Tracking: Add support for TagsMetadata in endpoints #37543
    6.0.0
  • Minimal APIs ServiceBase #37540
    Discussions
  • calling OnPostPrint, sometimes I got dates from model binding property, sometimes i got default dates (0001-01-01 , 00:00).1st, 3rd calls i got default dates, 2nd, 4th calls i got real dates #37539
  • Type Inference on generic razor components improvements #37569

Closed

  • Failed to launch debug adapter using .NET 5 Blazor WASM and IIS Express #36372
    Backlog
  • Faster generated headers enumeration for HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #33352
    7.0-preview1
  • Razor class library - staticwebassets folder not included after first build #37505
  • Using multiple typeparam types in a Tuple passes in the typeparam name instead of the type #20838
    7.0-preview1
  • [Razor] CSS/JS isolation in a Razor Class Library #37559
  • JSInProcessObjectReferenceExtensions.InvokeVoid should call IJSInProcessObjectReference.Invoke<IJSVoidResult> #37528
    6.0.0
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_dapper, mvc, plaintext #37495
  • Allow Blazor event propagation ( bubbling up the event ) #37517
    6.0.0
  • For Blazor wasm hosted App, ability to run server side component for some sensitive page #33691
    Backlog
  • Razor in CSS or CSS in Razor anyone? #33692
    Backlog
  • Enable multi-threaded WASM runtime #28360
    Backlog
  • Docker Compose Directory Structure Causes Bad StaticWebAssets XML File #34221
    Backlog
  • [Blazor-wasm] multi-threading support via workers. #36311
    Backlog
  • Warning when using BuildServiceProvider in top-level program #37554
  • Where is the ASP.NET Branding and Logo? #37550
  • Adding Multiple Http Policy Handlers Throws Exception in RC2 #37547
    6.0.0
  • Log message in RazorSdk will throw exception due to incorrect parameter number #37467
    6.0.0
  • Strange dotnet.*.js versioning when targeting net5.0 with 6.0 SDK #37256
    6.0.0
  • Blazor WASM perf tests are broken in perf lab #37469
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Specify the correct path for BlazorWASM project #37571
    area-mvc
  • Specify the correct path for BlazorWASM project #37567
    area-mvc
  • Backport #37532 (Pass IJSVoidResult instead of object to Invoke to indicate void result) #37566
    area-blazor
  • [Static web assets] Fixes an issue where patterns at the root were not being considered #37560
    area-blazor, feature-static-web-assets
  • Publish Windows x64/x86 checksums #37557
    area-infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #37542
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Unquarantine tests #37572
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Replace HashCodeCombiner with HashCode #37558
    7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Publish Windows x64/x86 checksums #37564
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.0
  • HTTP headers enumerator move directly to next #37538
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Support generic value tuple parameters in components #34737
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Only attempt to import blazor-hotreload.js is AspNetCore Browser tools middleware is present #37531
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Pass IJSVoidResult instead of object to Invoke to indicate void result #37532
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Bump url-parse from 1.5.1 to 1.5.3 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/signalr #37313
    area-signalr, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript, 7.0-preview1
  • Remove FakeStartup classes #36988
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Improve project reference consistency #37338
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix multiple dictionary add in polly #37537
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.0
  • Update node js version in container #37534
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix multiple dictionary add in polly #37533
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Wait for Redis to be ready in tests #37102
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix #37340 by guarding the initial ping for SignalR #37414
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Support setting ApiParameterRoutInfo for endpoints #37470
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • `<Virtualize>` Fixing `data-fetching` when horizontal scrolling is present on table layout #37451
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove MinimalSampleFSharp.fsproj from sln #32144
    area-infrastructure
  • Only attempt to import blazor-hotreload.js is AspNetCore Browser tool… #37536
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor
  • Set the aria-invalid attribute to "true" instead of true (v2) #37523
    area-blazor, 6.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] CollectionView does not reflect added items properly on navigated page #2958
  • [Bug] If user hasn't set a height or width constraint on a checkbox/entry/other input controls then we should default to a minimum of 44x44 #2957
  • [Bug] Height and Width need to resize the EditText on on Android #2956
  • [Bug] Occasionally Maui Repository fails to compile because staticwebassets.pack.sentinel file can't be written to #2955
  • Upgrading Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK crashes MAUI application #2953
  • [Bug] Dismissing iOS Modal Form Page causes NRE #2948
  • [Bug] Dynamically added children not reflect in Maui Preview 9 #2946
  • [Bug] Android.Gms.Auth.Api.Phone and SmsRetriever not found #2944
  • [Bug] MAUI Preview 9: Changes to iOS info.plist are ignored #2943
  • [Bug] Need recipe file #2942
  • [Bug] Unable to run published WinUI app #2941
  • [Enhancement] Allow selecting of specific target frameworks. #2939

Closed

  • [Bug] Maui Template WinUI wont start #2897
  • HTML input limited functionality in BlazorWebView #2647

PullRequests

Created

  • Customize Android and Windows ScrollView behavior to include Padding inside of scroll area #2959

Merged

  • Prepare for the arrival of the great WASDK update #2954
  • WinUI Toolbar Handler #2875
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Essentials] Cleanup docs on pick file #2874
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Essentials] Implement the new ConnectivityManager.NetworkCallback for N+ #2873
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Essentials] Fix orientation rotation delay on Android #2872
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Essentials] Update LocationExtensions.ios.tvos.watchos.macos.cs #2871
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Essentials] Set the PopoverPresentationController for files too #2870
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2940
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update the Windows App SDK and Win2D #2668
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • WIP: Update Blazor Desktop template to latest .NET 6 content #2938
  • Make shimmed Frame work on Android/Windows #2677
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Android] ToolbarHandler and fixes for various page nesting scenarios #2781
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core Migrations command broken with .Net 6 RC1 on M1 Mac (see notes) #26361
  • [Q] SqlNullabilityProcessor.VisitSqlFunction, Nullability of SUM function #26357
  • Regression: GroupJoin (left join) fails when using InMemory provider and entity has an Owned type #26354
  • Test Subquery_with_Distinct_Skip_FirstOrDefault_without_OrderBy is non-deterministic #26353
  • Nested projection fails to translate to query #26352
  • Bad formatting of scaffolded temporal table configuration #26349
  • How to do a missing migration check in CI #26348
  • API for graph traversal ? #26347
  • Table splitting: Make HasColumnName optional #26345
  • SqlNullabilityProcessor and COALESCE with more than two arguments #26344
  • EF CORE 5.0 ThenInclude OrderBy, uses PK before OrderBy field, rendering it useless #26343
  • 'object' type with column type 'Text' works on SQLite but not in SQLServer #26341
  • EF Core Closed Connection #26339

Closed

  • How to model many-to-many relations with readonly collections? (DDD) #26356
  • "The value of shadow key property 'PROPERTYNAME' is unknown when attempting to save changes" on tracked entities #26330
    6.0.0
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Migrations.Design missing in EF Core 6 RC2 #26351

PullRequests

Merged

  • [6.0] Flag all properties as not unknown when saving changes #26346
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26355
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #26320
